titleStmt.title: The vvhole confession and speech of Mr. Nathaniel Tompkins, made upon the ladder at the time of his execution, on Wednesday the fifth of July; 1643. Together with the manner of his coming to execution. July 5. 1643. It is this day ordered by the committee of the House of Commons in Parliament concerning printing, that the confession of Nathaniel Tompkins be printed by Peter Cole. Iohn White.
titleStmt.author: Tompkins, Nathaniel, d. 1643.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Peter Cole at the Glove and Lyon in Cornhill neer the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Tompkins was involved in Waller's plot.
